title: Paris Saint-Germain 4-1 Lille: Ligue 1 leaders hit four first-half goals in rout
description: Paris Saint-Germain continued their relentless march towards a fourth straight Ligue 1 title with a 4-1 win over fifth-placed Lille on Saturday, scoring all their goals in the first half. The capital club have 62 points from 24 matches and now boast a 16-point lead over both Marseille, who host Nantes on Sunday, and third-placed […] The post Paris Saint-Germain 4-1 Lille: Ligue 1 leaders hit four first-half goals in rout appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Athletic Bilbao: Super sub Alvarez takes hosts top
description: Atletico Madrid went top of LaLiga as Julian Alvarez came off the bench to score the winner in their 1-0 triumph over Athletic Bilbao on Saturday. Los Colchoneros had a chance to go top ahead of Barcelona hosting Real Sociedad on Sunday, after Real Madrid lost 2-1 at Real Betis earlier on Saturday.
